phrases: Mark, can you set the table?
We have to behave like we normally do.
Yesterday, we broke the rules and went to the gate.
But we did not find anything.
But she does not know who left it there.
She does not show it on her face at all.
And that is what we have to do, too.
If our faces show it, Mom will notice.
The delicious feed, the white clothes where dirt can easily stand out, the well-regulated life...
This is all to maintain our quality as merchandise.
The only thing we can do is to wait as we are shipped out indiscriminately.
We have been shipping out normal quality ones.
Judging from those words, age probably equals the grade of meat.
the siblings who were shipped out were between six and twelve years old.
If being six years old is ranked as normal, then the highest quality is...
Meat will not taste better even if we get good scores on tests, right?
It was never announced unless we got full scores, but maybe...
The order of getting shipped out?
After we turn six, we get harvested starting from the lower test scores.
And when we turn 12, we get shipped out no matter what.
So we were never shipped out because we have full scores?
But I do not understand why it depends on our scores.
Is there meaning for being between the age of six and twelve?
Then it would depend on our weight.
The brain probably tastes the best.
And the more developed brain, the better.
And they do not care how much they risk or spend.
That is why we are high-quality merchandise.
Based on the cycle so far, the next shipment should be two months from now at the earliest.
We need to think of a way for all of us to escape before then.
If we draw a simple map of this site, the House is in the middle and then the gate.
And the forest that surrounds us.
First, which one should we escape from?
The gate is always closed except during shipping, and when it is open...
When do we escape through the forest?
At playtime, during the day, when we can get out of the House freely?
Or at night during shipping when Mom is not
And I am worried if the younger ones can stay awake at night.
We will escape during the day through the forest.
Depends on what it is like beyond the forest.
I guess I am tired from thinking too much.
Sheesh, I guess it cannot be helped.
But this wall is about two to three meters thick.
There are no edges, let alone any seams.
There is no way anyone could climb this.
But that is what this wall would have us think.
If it was you or me, we could climb it as long as we had a rope.
I do not sense any demons around.
The only one watching us is Mom.
I got separated from Naila in the forest!
I tried looking, but I could not find her!
She got tired and fell asleep.
Look, not a scratch on her.
It was like Mom knew exactly where Naila was.
Come to think of it, Mom has always been good at finding us.
No matter where we hid, she found us quickly.
That is not a pocket watch.
They could be implanted somewhere in our bodies.
And Mom used the compact and purposely showed us so we would figure it out.
No matter who it is, I will not let you escape.
That is probably what Mom wants to say.
First, let us get our hands on some rope.
I have an idea where they might be.
I will see you tonight at 10 in the hallway.
They have tracking devices on us,
so what if they have other stuff, like cameras or listening devices?
I looked around a bit, and there was nothing like that here.
The security measures are not on the building, but on us.
Do you think Mom knows already?
That we went all the way to the wall...
I mean, she did not know about that other time, either.
When we went to deliver Little Bunny.
It is not like Mom always knows where we are at all times.
She will know our location only when she checks.
She knows that Little Bunny was brought to the gate by someone other than Conny.
But I do not think she figured out who it was.
Or else she would not have warned us in such a roundabout way.
The clock is not quite working properly.
Okay, I will take a look.
Which reminds me, you were not so cheerful this morning.
I just got a little sad thinking that Ill leave the House soon, too.
Do you like it here at the House?
I love the House and you, Mom!
I wonder what Conny's doing right now?
Conny said she wanted to be a mother like you when she grew up.
I am sure Conny will become a lovely adult,
Besides, we were having too much fun playing tag yesterday.
As long as you did not go.
This was a really good idea, Norman.
This can be used as rope.
With this, we can get over the wall.
The challenge is still ahead of us.
I think it might be fine if we told Ray.
Ray most likely would not panic.
And because of his extensive knowledge, he is good with machines, too.
I am sure we can depend on him.
I will talk to Ray myself.
Why do not you go back, and
It is been bugging me for a while, so I thought I should ask about it.
What happened at the gate that night?
When you went to go deliver Little Bunny to Conny.
You were both clearly acting weird.
And you were empty-handed when you said you did not make it.
Ray is smart, too, after all.
So you are saying we were preciously taken care of to become demon food.
I am surprised you are believing us so easily.
Norman would not make up such a stupid lie.
It would be different with you, Emma.
So, if we are really going to escape, there are various issues.
- We will narrow it down to who can make it and - Wait!
I want to escape with everyone.
And the majority are under six years old.
These factors make an already difficult escape even more challenging.
Emma, you have not noticed, have you?
That is why you said you will talk to me yourself.
You have to be blunt about these kinds of things.
It will not be enough just to escape from here.
We do not know what it is like on the outside.
But there is a place we are getting shipped to.
Because there is a farm, that should give you an idea.
What waits outside is a demon's society.
There is no place for humans to live.
If we take everyone, we will all die.
Even if it is impossible, I want to escape with everyone.
I do not want all of us to die.
But there is no option to leave them behind.
I want Conny to be the last.
I do not want anyone to end up like that ever again.
If there is not one, then let us make a place for humans to live outside.
I understand now, thanks to you, Ray.
That is the kind of prison break we have to do.
I am not giving up on this.
So, Ray, you are the one who has to give up.
Stop jabbering around and help us!
We will escape with everyone, no matter what!
Or else I will not do it.
But I am glad she is so cheerful.
I wanted for you to stop her!
Or you are both going to die.
You knew that from the very start, huh?
That night, I thought she was crying because she was scared.
But Emma was crying because she was scared of her family dying.
She thinks of protecting others in that situation.
But it is not the correct thing.
It is a boat made of mud!
And it is just us three, right?
If it is just us, we can escape.
You are correct, and you should not feel ashamed.
Do not distort your decision based on emotions, Norman!
I also want to make a boat out of mud.
You are more cool-headed, and you always take the best option.
I like Emma, so that is why I want her to always be smiling.
And what if Emma dies because of it?
I will not let her die.
That is why I am going to utilize myself.
Luckily, I have always managed to accomplish what I set out to do.
And if you bake mud, it will become a vessel.
A boat made out of mud will not necessarily sink.
Both Emma and I are insane.
You cannot let us do this on our own, right?
We still have free time left, do not we?
This is your newest little sister, Carol.
She is here to help me.
I will be living here with all of you starting today.
It is nice to meet you.
- It is nice to meet you.
